title: Databases
text:
Historical Wealth Inequality Database





Worldwide estimates of wealth inequality from 10,000 BC to current day.



Features:




National and local Gini coefficients


Multiple measures of wealth



Access database







Swedish Labour History Database





Statistics on employment, labour conflicts, unions, and wages in Swedish history.



Features:




National-, county-, and industry-level data


Download figures



Access database







Research databases





Niche databases related to labour history and history of wealth inequality.



Features:

title: Uppsala History of Inequality and Labour Lab
text:
About


UHILL is a quantitatively oriented research lab at the Department of Economic History at Uppsala University focusing on labour history and development of wealth inequality in the long run.

Read more

text: Ericsson, J., & Molinder, J. (2020). “Economic Growth and the Development of Real Wages: Swedish Construction Workers’ Wages in Comparative Perspective, 1831–1900”, The Journal of Economic History, 80(3): 813–852. Open access at journal, Earlier WP.
